original_text: The Lord says to his people, ‘Foreign people will take care of your sheep for you. They will work on your farms, and they will take care of your vines. 61: God's people would be able to pay foreigners to work for them. The Lord says to his people,
korean_text: 외인은 서서 너희 양 떼를 칠 것이요 이방 사람은 너희 농부와 포도원지기가 될 것이나

sentences.original_text: The Lord says to his people
Foreign people will take care of your sheep for you
sentences.korean_translation: 외국인들이 당신의 양을 돌봐 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will work on your farms
and they will take care of your vines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 당신의 포도나무를 돌볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: God's people would be able to pay foreigners to work for them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 백성은 외국인에게 일을 시키고 급여를 줄 수 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord says to his people
